sect1.title: Install Python
sect1.para: Follow the instructions on to install Python. For mpc55xx-bam-loader-g1 select the latest stable version of Python 3. At the moment this is Python 3.4.
If pip is not already installed follow the instructions on

sect1.title: Install the software
sect1.para: Use the tool pip to install the package mpc55xx-bam-loader-g1
You can find more information about using pip on .
If not yet installed, the software pyserial will be also installed. You can find more information about pyserial on .

sect1.title: Test with Phytec phyCORE-MPC5554
sect1.para: You need to set the Jumper JP1 to the memory, which has been erased. When BAM cannot start an application in the selected memory, then it listens on the eSCI_A and on the CAN port.
Connect the serial cable to the lower serial port.
